SELECT DISTINCT M.ID, M.PHONE, M.PASSWORD, LISTAGG(C.CAR_CODE, '/') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY C.CAR_CODE) OVER(PARTITION BY C.HOUSE_INFO) AS CARCODE , LISTAGG(C.CAR_TYPE, '/') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY C.CAR_TYPE) OVER(PARTITION BY C.HOUSE_INFO) AS CARTYPE FROM MEMBER M JOIN GENERATION G ON M.HOUSE_INFO = G.HOUSE_INFO JOIN CARLIST C ON G.HOUSE_INFO = C.HOUSE_INFO WHERE M.ID = #{id}
